summary: A poor young Scandinavian immigrant couple winds up in Canada in search of prosperity, but the hardship of the Great Depression takes a toll in a way they never feared when they went in search of the dream.
cast: Nikolaj Lie Kaas|Gil Bellows|Line Verndal|Gage Munroe|Martha Burns|Lane Styles|Aidan Devine|Rachel Blanchard|Darren Felbel|Nancy Jane Drake|Cory Wojcik|Blane Cypurda|Karl Thordarson
title: Mad Ship
